Docs.summary: Responsible for layout of text stored in a object.

remarks.para: iOS 7 introduced "Text Kit," a broad set of APIs and modifications of existing classes, built on N:CoreText, that greatly expands the typographical flexibility of iOS.

The 's property holds a reference to a object, that holds a potentially large amount of styled text. The 's P:UIKit.NSLayoutManager.NSTextContainers property holds an ordered array of objects in which it lays out text. The s, in turn, hold references to objects, which actually display the text.
